title: Deploy authentication service
description: Deploy the new authentication service to production with OAuth2 support, session management, and rate limiting. Includes Helm chart updates and canary rollout strategy.
acceptance_criteria:
- OAuth2 flows working in staging
- Session TTL configurable
- Rate limiter at 100 req/s per user
- Canary at 5% for 24h before full rollout

title: Fix CI pipeline timeout
description: The CI pipeline times out on the integration test stage after the monorepo migration. Need to optimize test parallelism and add sharding.

title: Add monitoring dashboards
description: Set up Grafana dashboards for the new microservices. Include latency percentiles, error rate, throughput, and saturation panels per service.

title: Update API documentation
description: API docs are stale after the v3 migration. Regenerate OpenAPI spec from source annotations and update all request/response examples.

title: Refactor database connection pooling
description: Extract common query patterns into a shared utility package. Add connection pool metrics and configurable pool sizes per service.

title: Write integration tests for auth
description: Full integration test suite for the authentication service including OAuth flows, token refresh, and session invalidation.

title: Performance optimization sprint
description: Identify and resolve top 5 performance bottlenecks across the platform. Target: 50% p99 latency reduction on critical paths.

title: Profile database queries
description: Run EXPLAIN ANALYZE on top 20 slow queries. Identify missing indexes and N+1 patterns.

title: Optimize API serialization
description: Benchmark JSON vs protobuf for inter-service communication. Implement the faster option for hot paths.

title: Benchmark JSON vs protobuf
description: Run benchmarks with realistic payloads (user profiles, order histories, search results). Measure serialization time, payload size, and memory allocation.

title: Migrate user preferences to new schema
close_reason: Migration complete, verified in production with zero downtime

title: Fix memory leak in WebSocket handler
close_reason: Root cause: unbounded channel buffer. Fixed with ring buffer + backpressure.

title: Set up staging environment
close_reason: Staging env live with full data seeding pipeline

title: Integrate payment gateway
description: Stripe integration for subscription billing. Blocked on the billing service deploy which hasn't been created yet.

title: Run load tests on auth service
description: K6 load test suite targeting 10k concurrent users. Blocked on auth deploy completing first.

title: Update changelog for v3
description: Compile release notes from merged PRs. Categorize by feature, fix, and breaking change.

title: Ship mobile push notifications
description: FCM + APNs integration for order status and delivery alerts. Requires notification preferences UI.

title: Patch XSS in comment renderer
description: User-supplied markdown in comments is not sanitized before rendering. Affects the review and discussion features.

title: Evaluate new caching layer
description: Compare Redis Cluster vs Dragonfly vs KeyDB for the session cache tier. Benchmark under production-like load.

title: Consolidate error handling
description: Standardize error types and response codes across all services. Related to monitoring work.

title: Implement rate limiting middleware
description: Token bucket rate limiter with per-tenant configuration. Supports burst allowance and graceful degradation.

title: Design Stripe webhook handler
description: Handle checkout.session.completed, invoice.paid, and subscription events. Idempotent processing with event dedup.
